function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of resilience in current residential buildings to current and future pandemics","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission and compromised public health","Mitigation":"Integration of resilient mechanisms and design guidelines into existing and future residential buildings","Technologies":"Resilient building materials, ventilation systems, and touchless fixtures","People":"Residents, occupants, and visitors of residential buildings","Owner":"Architects, designers, and building owners"},{"Description":"Survey revealing key shortcomings of current housing conditions in the context of COVID-19 restrictions","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission and compromise of public health in residential spaces","Mitigation":"Implementation of guidelines for improvement and increased resilience in residential spaces","Technologies":"Improved ventilation systems, touchless fixtures, and spatial reconfiguration","People":"Residential space users, occupants, and visitors","Owner":"Architects, designers, and building owners"}]}
